name: Core_DepthCompareMode
description: An enumeration of depth compare modes.
A depth compare mode denotes if an incoming fragment is retained or discarded depending on the outcome of the comparison of its depth value with its corresponding depth value in the depth buffer.

elements.name: Core_DepthCompareMode_Equal
elements.description: The incoming fragment passes if its depth value is equal to its corresponding depth value in the depth buffer.

elements.name: Core_DepthCompareMode_NotEqual
elements.description: The incoming fragment passes if its depth value is not equal to its corresponding depth value in the depth buffer.

elements.name: Core_DepthCompareMode_LessThan
elements.description: The incoming fragment passes if its depth value is less than its corresponding depth value in the depth buffer.

elements.name: Core_DepthCompareMode_LessThanOrEqualTo
elements.description: The incoming fragment passes if its depth value is less than or equal to its corresponding depth value in the depth buffer.

elements.name: Core_DepthCompareMode_GreaterThan
elements.description: The incoming fragment passes if its depth value is greater than its corresponding depth value in the depth buffer.

elements.name: Core_DepthCompareMode_GreaterThanOrEqualTo
elements.description: The incoming fragment passes if its depth value is greater than or equal to its coressponding depth value in the depth buffer.
